note.p: Swiss zoologist. Studied medicine at Basel and Heidelberg from 1866 but switched to zoology after four semesters and received his doctorate in 1870. Assistant, Zoological Institute, Heidelberg, 1871; Jena, 1872. Habilitated in zoology, Dresden Technical Institute, 1874; professor extraordinarius of zoology, 1878; director of the zoological collection, 1880. A strong supporter of CD. Editor of the scientific journal Kosmos from October 1882.
